data.lyric:
[ti:Let You Be Right]
[ar:Meghan Trainor]
[al:Let You Be Right]
[by:]

[00:00.00]LET YOU BE RIGHT - Meghan Trainor
[00:04.67]Written by：Meghan Trainor/Andrew Wells
[00:09.34]Love me love me
[00:11.61]Don't forget you love me
[00:13.50]When I break things make things
[00:16.01]A little bit uncomfy
[00:18.25]Baby don't hate me
[00:20.52]You probably think I'm crazy
[00:22.63]And it's stupid and foolish
[00:25.14]The way we've been behavin'
[00:27.25]So don't keep draggin' this on and on
[00:32.15]When you know that you're wrong you're wrong
[00:36.65]
[00:37.27]I don't wanna fight tonight
[00:38.97]I'm let you be right
[00:40.67]
[00:41.92]I don't wanna fight tonight
[00:43.48]I'm let you be right let you be right
[00:46.42]We can make up if you just kiss me at the next traffic light

[00:52.72]I'm let you be right let you be right
[00:55.41]Oh let you be right let you be right
[01:00.05]Oh let you be right woo

[01:55.03]Oh let you be right woo
[01:58.89]Love me love me
[02:01.28]Don't forget you love me

data.trans:
[ti:Let You Be Right]
[ar:Meghan Trainor]
[al:Let You Be Right]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.67]//
[00:09.34]爱我吧 爱我吧
[00:11.61]别忘了 你爱我
[00:13.50]当我摧毁一切 又将一切筑起
[00:16.01]感觉有些难过
[00:18.25]宝贝 我不要恨我
[00:20.52]你或许觉得我有些疯狂
[00:22.63]我们一直以来的行为表现
[00:25.14]简直愚不可及
[00:27.25]所以当你知道自己已经错了
[00:32.15]就不要再苦苦挣扎
[00:36.65]
[00:37.27]今晚我不想和你抗争
[00:38.97]我会为你让步
[00:40.67]
[00:41.92]今晚我不想和你抗争
[00:43.48]我会为你让步 为你让步
[00:46.42]如果你在下一个路灯处吻我 我们就可以复合
[00:51.02]今晚我不想和你抗争
[00:52.72]我会为你让步 为你让步
[00:55.41]我会为你让步 为你让步
[01:00.05]会为你让步
[01:04.20]相信我 相信我
[01:06.38]我需要你对我委以信任
[01:08.31]因为 当我说糟糕不堪时 并非在
[01:10.98]言明我有多不容易
